sense.gloss: viewing through a window, passing through a window, going through a window, doing through a window

sdata.j: ↑窓↑↓|まど↓↑越↑↓ご↓し|に↑彼↑↓かれ↓がやってくるのが↑見↑↓み↓えた。
sdata.e: I was able to see him coming through the window.

sdata.j: トムは↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑落↑↓お↓ちるのを↑窓↑↓|まど↓↑越↑↓ご↓し|に↑眺↑↓なが↓めながら、↑切↑↓せつ↓ない↑曲↑↓きょく↓を↑聴↑↓き↓いた。
sdata.e: Tom listened to some sad music while watching the rain fall through the window.
